General.Description: GXShares which is called GXS is one of DPoS cryptocurrencies that provides a secured, fast data transaction and credit verification service based on the updated blockchain technology.
General.Features: GXS has contribute the user privacy protection. Moreover, the GXShare brought many useful features such as point-to-point data exchange, two - way anonymous mechanism, Data fraud control, Credit contribution certification, etc.
General.Technology: Based on the DPoS algorithm, GXShares has the all features of DPoS cryptocurrency that will build upon the idea of decentralization and blockchain technologythis platform. Furthermore, the first GXChain-based decentralized APP will be the best platform for any customers to exchage the trasitional data.
